jobdetails.title: Android Developer
jobdetails.description1: 3-5 years of experience in building Native Android applications on phones and tablets
jobdetails.description2: Have experience in working with syncing offline and online databases with CouchDB/SQLite will be a plus.

jobdetails.title: Job Title 2
jobdetails.description2: Good Knowledge in Javascript, Experience with Subversion or GIT.

jobdetails.title: Job Title 3
jobdetails.description1: Experience in Integrating Google API, Maps, Calendar.
jobdetails.description2: Strong Knowledge and working experience on Push Notifications.

jobdetails.title: Job Title 4
jobdetails.description1: Good understanding of ANRs and how to prevent them.
jobdetails.description2: Understanding of Gradle and how to use it for building with support/third party libraries.

jobdetails.title: Job Title 5
jobdetails.description1: Working experience with the Android Studio and Android SDK/Cordova

jobdetails.title: Job Title 6
jobdetails.description1: Have built applications with slick animations.
jobdetails.description2: Strong OO design and programming skills in Java.
